name: Salesforce Embedded Survey Example
description: An example of using Surveys in an iframe on a 3rd party website

BG_FAKE.description: The URL for the Fake website background

SURVEY_URL.description: The URL for the Survey Invitation

BUTTON_CLASS.description: The Bootstrap class for th button color - Choose from btn-primary btn-secondary btn-success btn-warning btn-success btn-danger btn-warning btn-info btn-light btn-dark btn-link

BUTTON_TEXT.description: The label for the Floating Feedback Button

PRIVATE_KEY.description: The Private KEY for the Ceritifcate used in the Connected App

LOGIN_URL.description: The URL for the Salesforce org

USERNAME.description: The user name of the Salesforce integration user

CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer Key from the Connected App

SURVEY_HAS_CONTACT.description: Is the Survey related to a Contact? If not the Survey URL above is required (YES or NO)

CONTACT_ID.description: The Id of the Contact Record to which the Feedback must be related
